Sammamish.KPLZ-FM: KPLZ-FM (101.5 FM) is a commercial radio station located in Seattle, Washington. KPLZ broadcasts on a frequency of 101.5 MHz with an ERP of 100,000 watts through a transmitter located on Cougar Mountain, while its studios and offices are co-located with television partner KOMO-TV within KOMO Plaza (formerly Fisher Plaza) in the Lower Queen Anne section of Seattle, directly across the street from the Space Needle. The station is owned and operated by the Sinclair Broadcast Group.
